fields.name: Royal Blood (Passive):
fields.value:
During elections for a new King, votes for you count twice.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Flirt (Night):
fields.value: Limit a player's ~~class~~ role type down to 2 options

fields.name: Flirt Results:
fields.value:
Power/Head
Killing/Protective
Investigative/Deception
Support/Literally any other alignment

fields.name: Will O' Wisp (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value:
Discover if target player attacks anyone tonight.
- Does not count as a visit.
